original_text: And two other rings of gold thou shalt make, and shalt put them on the two sides of the ephod underneath, toward the forepart thereof, over against the other coupling thereof, above the curious girdle of the ephod.
korean_text: 또 금 고리 둘을 만들어 에봇 앞 두 어깨받이 아래 매는 자리 가까운 쪽 곧 정교하게 짠 띠 위쪽에 달고

sentences.original_text: And two other rings of gold thou shalt make
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 또 다른 두 개의 금반지를 만들 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shalt put them on the two sides of the ephod underneath
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들을 에봇의 양쪽 아래쪽에 두어야 할지니

sentences.original_text: over against the other coupling thereof
above the curious girdle of the ephod
